{{adaptation}} {{infobox character | people=[[Hobbits|Hobbit]] | name=Dilly Brandyfoot | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location= | affiliation= | language= | birth=Late [[Second Age]] | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Brandyfoot]] | parentage=[[Largo Brandyfoot]] and [[Marigold Brandyfoot]] | siblings=[[Elanor Brandyfoot]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Dilly Brandyfoot''' was a [[Harfoots|Harfoot]] of the [[Second Age]]. Her character was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power|The Rings of Power]]'' television series by [[Amazon Studios]], where she was portrayed by [[Beau Cassidy]]. == History == Dilly is the daughter of [[Largo Brandyfoot]], the stepdaughter of [[Marigold Brandyfoot]], and the sister of [[Elanor Brandyfoot|Elanor "Nori" Brandyfoot]]. She gathers berries away from the camp along with other children, though she and Nori spot a mysterious paw print. Dilly is told that it is simply a dog, and is told to go back home, though Nori and her friend, [[Poppy Proudfellow]], note that it is actually the print of a [[wolf]]."[[A Shadow of the Past]]" == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | ROS |~| LAR |y| MAR | | | | |ROS=[[Rose Brandyfoot]]
